Actions.Name: Add or update term
Actions.Description: Add or update a term in a termset

Actions.Name: Add or update term by key value
Actions.Description: Add or update a term in a termset using a keyvalue. For example: A static ID field from a CRM system.

Actions.Name: Generate document
Actions.Description: Generate document using a template ID that must be uploaded previously using this action. Enter the document data in JSON format

Actions.Name: Upload document template
Actions.Description: Uploads a document template that can be used for 24 hours to generate documents.
